thread.title: Ketron "KC" Shaw named to HBCU All-American Team
thread.title_full: Ketron "KC" Shaw named to HBCU All-American Team

author: Via University
title: Ketron "KC" Shaw named to HBCU All-American Team
text:
Ketron “KC” Shaw named to HBCU All-American Team
Ketron Shaw selected to Box-To-Row's HBCU All-American Team University of Maryland Eastern Shore combo guard Ketron KC Shaw was selected to Box-To-Row's HBCU All-American Second Team earlier this week. In his first year at the University of Maryland Eastern Shore, Shaw led the Hawks in scoring, assists and in rebounding throughout the season. Shaw's 18.0 points per game ranksed fourth in the MEAC while his 5.9 rebounds per contest ranked fifth in the conference. He was also a top ten assist man in the MEAC finishing the regular season ranked seventh averaging 3.1 assists. Shaw recorded 14 games of 20...
Read more at University of Maryland Eastern Shore Athletics
